Basic details: Emily Johnson, a 28-year-old female, comes to the ED after experiencing a sexual assault.
Vitals:
BP: 110/70 mm Hg
Temp: 99.1°F (37.3°C)
RR: 18/minute
HR: 88/minute, regular
Physical presentation:
Sit quietly, appearing withdrawn and anxious.
Avoid eye contact and flinch at sudden movements.
If asked about injuries, mention soreness and bruising but no visible bleeding.
If a forensic exam is mentioned, ask, "What does that involve?"
Challenging question: "Will I ever feel safe again? How can I be sure this won't happen to me again?"
